src_original: bheryā saṃgrāma-śīrṣe vā sadā kāmā hananti māṃ ||[2] ||
bheryās tu hanyamānāyā bhaved vīcī muhur muhuḥ |  kāṣṭha-srotā upapannaṃ vā sadā kāmā hananti me || [3] ||
sarve bhavanto sukhitā yeṣāṃ gāthā pratibhānti |
ahaṃ khalu na jānāmi kiṃ jīvāmi marāmi vā ||[5] ||
te deva-putrā āhaṃsuḥ |  tvaṃ suṣṭhu adhyavasito tathaiva [e]ṣā bharaṇī |  [yuṣmākaṃ ]bhavatu devī [yā] sarva-aṅga-śobhanā || [6] ||
